LanguageData.DigifoxFactionGreetingHostile: {0} The silence deafens the coms. Whether anyone is listening, there is no way to tell.
LanguageData.DigifoxFactionGreetingHostileAppreciativ: {0} demands that you prove you aren't in league with that damn AI. You'll have to earn their trust. Bring gifts to one of {0_possessive} settlements or release {0_possessive} faction's prisoners unharmed. Until then, {0_pronoun} is unwilling to talk.
LanguageData.DigifoxFactionGreetingWary: {0} gives a cold greeting and asks why'd you called.
LanguageData.DigifoxFactionGreetingWarm: {0} warmly greets {NEGOTIATOR_labelShort} and asks what {LEADER_pronoun} can do to help you.
LanguageData.DigifoxMilitaryAidSent: {0} signals that troops will arrive shortly.
